name: Those Who Leap
description:
*---Just a heads up---*

This game is not done, but I am finished working on it.

This is more of a proof of concept and is something that I would like to dwell into at a later date, but right now I would like to work on other projects.

Thanks for those that play!

*--------------------------*

Controls:

Z: Jump, even while in the air! Only can be used once.

X: Run, so you can reach those farther places!

R: Restart, only if you get stuck!

Twitter: @Coxyworthy

Tumblr: bryancoxgames.tumblr.com
